overview: This biographical video uses interviews and action footage from real games to give viewers an up-close look at the life and career of basketball superstar Earvin "Magic" Johnson. Johnson's outstanding athletic talent is traced from high school through his years with the Los Angeles Lakers, during which he helped to lead the team to five NBA championships.
tagline: This biographical video uses interviews and action footage from real games to give viewers an up-close look at the life and career of basketball superstar Earvin
title: Magic Johnson: Always Showtime
